original_text: And as for thine asses that were lost three days ago, set not thy mind on them; for they are found. And on whom is all the desire of Israel? Is it not on thee, and on all thy father's house?
korean_text: 사흘 전에 잃은 네 암나귀들을 염려하지 말라 찾았느니라 온 이스라엘이 사모하는 자가 누구냐 너와 네 아버지의 온 집이 아니냐 하는지라

sentences.original_text: that were lost three days ago
set not thy mind on them;
And on whom is all the desire of Israel?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘의 모든 소망이 누구에게 있는가?

sentences.original_text: and on all thy father's house?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신 아버지의 온 집안에 있지 않은가?
